title: BRIEF-XORTX Therapeutics Announces Positive Phase 2 Results In Type 2 Diabetic Nephropathy
text:
BRIEF-XORTX Therapeutics Announces Positive Phase 2 Results In Type 2 Diabetic Nephropathy

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 19, 2019 21:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-XORTX Therapeutics Announces Positive Phase 2 Results In Type 2 Diabetic Nephropathy Sept 19 (Reuters) - XORTX Therapeutics Inc : * XORTX ANNOUNCES POSITIVE PHASE 2 RESULTS IN TYPE 2 DIABETIC NEPHROPATHY (T2DN) * XORTX THERAPEUTICS INC - STUDY ACHIEVED PRIMARY ENDPOINT FOR EFFICACY OF THIS STUDY AND TMX-049 WAS WELL TOLERATED

BRIEF-XORTX Therapeutics Announces Positive Phase 2 Results In Type 2 Diabetic Nephropathy
